summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Mary E. Erdoes and Jes Staley discussing potential plans to go to Seattle. The email emphasizes confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing plans with the recipients.

persons.name: Mary E. Erdoes
persons.context: Mary E. Erdoes is one of the recipients of the email, receiving information regarding plans.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is another recipient of the email, included in the discussion about Seattle plans.

connections.description: The email suggests a relationship where Epstein is seeking advice or discussing plans with Erdoes, indicating a legal connection.
Epstein includes Staley in the email, indicating a social or professional connection.

keyFacts: It discusses potential plans to go to Seattle.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Epstein emphasizes the unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
The email includes a request for immediate notification if received in error.
